features: Day and night face and chest cream: provides skin with a daily dose of intense hydration that helps to fill in the appearance of lines and wrinkles and helps restore moisture for smoother, plumper skin

This lightweight, non-greasy moisturizer delivers hydration and moisture to all skin types, including sensitive skin and absorbs quickly without leaving a sticky film, for smoother, nourished, younger-looking skin
Proven results: Overnight, skin is nourished with moisture; In 1 week of using this face moisturizer skin feels smoother and in 4 weeks of use, wrinkles appear more filled in

Replenish skin with Collagen: Gift your skin a daily dose of hydration from L'Oreal Paris anti-aging skin care, whether face lotion, night eye creams, or moisturizers with SPF, they provide your skin essential moisture to keep skin healthy

Kickstart your routine; First cleanse with Revitalift Derm Intensives 3.5 percent Pure Glycolic Acid Gel Facial Cleanser, treat under eye with Eye Defense Eye Cream and hydrate day and night with Collagen Moisture Filler Moisturizer
body.description: Product Description As we age, collagen and moisture levels diminish, skin loses its bounce and wrinkles are formed. Collagen Daily Face Moisturizer provides a daily dose of intense hydration that helps to fill in the appearance of lines and wrinkles and restores moisture for smoother, plumper skin. Our Collagen is extracted and purified with a process that preserves all of its hydrating qualities. Apply collagen moisture filler moisturizer every day and night on the face – melting texture absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy or sticky film lightweight, non-greasy, non-comedogenic, dermatologist tested for safety. By L'Oreal Paris By L'Oreal Paris

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: America's #1 Collagen Moisturizer COLLAGEN MOISTURE FILLER As we age, collagen and moisture levels diminish. Skin loses its bounce and wrinkles are formed. Collagen Moisture Filler Face Moisturizer can be used as a day cream and night cream - it helps restore skin's cushion with intense moisture leaving skin smoother while being nourished. Over time, it infuses skin and smooths the surface by helping to fill in lines and wrinkles.

Start Your Regimen Glycolic Acid Cleanser Add to Cart Hyaluronic Acid Serum Add to Cart Eye Defense Eye Cream Add to Cart Collagen Moisture Filler Add to Cart Collagen Moisture Filler Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.6 out of 5 stars 4,156 4.5 out of 5 stars 45,871 4.3 out of 5 stars 19,135 4.5 out of 5 stars 59,653 4.5 out of 5 stars 59,653 Price $12.97$12.97 $19.79$19.79 $11.96$11.96 $8.98$8.98 $8.99$8.99 Your Recommended Regimen Cleanse + prep for serums Treat Treat Moisturizer Moisturizer Skin Benefit Resurface for brighter skin Hydrates + plumps skin Reduce dark circles + lines Fills in lines + wrinkles Fills in lines + wrinkles When to Use AM and PM AM and PM AM and PM AM and PM AM and PM Format Cleanser Serum Eye Cream Moisturizer Fragrance-Free Moisturizer Skin Type All Skin Types All Skin Types All Skin Types All Skin Types All Skin Types

When should I use L'Oreal Paris Collagen Moisture Filler Moisturizer? Use every day/night on the face after cleansing. Why is Collagen Moisture Filler right for me? As we age, collagen and moisture levels diminish. Skin loses its bounce and wrinkles are formed. Collagen Moisture Filler helps to fill in the appearance of lines and wrinkles. What kind of results can I expect? Overnight: skin is nourished with moisture. In 1 Week: skin is smoother. In 4 weeks: wrinkles are more filled in; skin looks younger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m 56 and my skin is looking wrinkly, this stuff makes my skin look better, the wrinkles slightly smoother and it feels great too.

reviews.reviewerName: The real deal! Super fast delivery. Amazing scent, worth all the hype it’s getting in social media.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for daily skin routine
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin and I have to be very cautious about the products I use. At almost 40yrs old I finally found a moisturizer that I am in love with. No scent, non greasy, lightweight, soothing and it leaves my face feeling rejuvenated. You only need a nickel size worth of product to get full coverage and my skin is definitely softer after a couple of days of using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So, I think like this product so far, but the scented one is strongly and unnecessarily scented. Like overpowering, burned my eyes the first time I used it-- strong. The unscented was sold out before I bought this one, but I wouldn't mind giving that version a try next time it's in stock.Overall, I do feel like this helps reduce fine lines and restore a bit of moisture, so I would recommend it for that part. It does seem a bit greasy, but my skin absorbs that a few hours after having it on. A little goes a long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Youthful Skin!
reviews.reviewText: I recently started using the L’Oréal Paris Collagen Daily Face Moisturizer, and I'm absolutely thrilled with the results! This product has quickly become an essential part of my skincare routine.First and foremost, the fragrance-free formula is a game-changer for me. It's gentle on my sensitive skin and doesn't cause any irritation. This is a huge plus, as I've had trouble with scented products in the past.The texture of this face cream is just perfect - it's creamy, yet light, and absorbs quickly into the skin. It leaves my face feeling hydrated without any greasiness. I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture of my skin since I started using this moisturizer. It feels smoother and looks more radiant.One of the main reasons I chose this product was for its collagen-boosting properties. As I've gotten older, I've started to notice fine lines and wrinkles appearing. After consistent use, I can confidently say that this moisturizer has made a noticeable difference in reducing the appearance of those wrinkles. My skin looks plumper and more youthful.I also appreciate that it comes in a generous 1.7 oz size, so it lasts a long time. A little goes a long way, so I feel like I'm getting great value for my money.Overall, L’Oréal Paris Collagen Daily Face Moisturizer has exceeded my expectations. It's a fantastic addition to my skincare routine and has become a staple product in my collection. If you're looking for a reliable, effective, and fragrance-free moisturizer to combat wrinkles and improve skin texture, this is definitely worth a try. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a different face cream during the day that felt more hydrating and could possibly help with wrinkle forming etc. I know it can’t all be stopped lol but this had good reviews and I can see why. It smells nice and the cream is moisturizing and easily smoothes on your face. I’ll be buying this from now on!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'd give this 10 stars if i could. I have tried so many moisturizers and this is now by far the best! I was someone who always thought you had to pay more to get results. But with prices so high on everything, I felt it was time I looked for a more budget friendly alternative to some of my high end products. This has shocked me it's that good. I've been using for 3+ months because I wanted to really test it and I started seeing results after 30 days. My skin is very moisturized in the AM after putting it on before bed. Also, it sinks right into the skin so it works with my foundation. Fine lines definitely appear softened. I highly recommend this moisturizer. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is thick & absorbs slowly leaving a sticky residue on your skin. If your skin is very, very dry this may be the lotion for you. In my opinion this wd not used during summer especially with high humidity. Best as a night cream in the winter. I gave it 3 stars because it's effect on your neck especially for older skin or those that have crepey skin for a temporary fix works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My skin was very dry and wrinkly looking prior to using this cream
reviews.reviewText: I wish I had taken a before and after picture of my face and hands prior to using this cream. I used to get Botox, but it has been close to 2 years since I haven't gotten any injections. I imagine if I had started this cream before, I would have delayed the Botox "needs" for much longer down the road. It keeps my skin moisturized and reduces fine wrinkles, which can be noticed immediately after the first application. It also makes my makeup look much nicer and smooth. :) As far as sensitivity, my skin isn't sensitive. I am biracial olive tan, so I can't give an opinion there other than to apply a small amount to try first and see how it works for you if you have sensitive skin.
Estoy encantada con esta crema, ha sido excelente para mi cutis maduro. Deja la piel super hidratada y suave, me encantó!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente cómo dejá de suave la cara
reviews.reviewText: me encanta porque es nutritiva pará mi piel seca,me la deja hidratada y es Pronto pero sin duda volveré a repetir

reviews.reviewTitle: Among the most premium, awesome creams around
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I began using this product, I noticed visible brightness and life in my facial skin. This is the first time I am using any product other than moisturizer on my face and I should say, the product really does magic to your skin. A highly recommended product for everyone who needs to replenish their face and skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really good quality cream and price is good aswell
Je suis très satisfaite de ce produit mais je trouve les frais de livraison prohibitifs. Presque aussi chers que le produit lui-même. Je paie déjà le Prime, c'est un peu beaucoup abusé là !!!!
